name: Make You're Way To The ...
description:
This game is made for the Brackeys Game Jam 2023.1. 

Theme: An End Is A New Beginning

---------------------

CONTROLS:

moving - WASD

Otherwise from the main menu go to the "OPTIONS" tab and have a look there. 

---------------------

How to delete and remove all data:

1) Delate the game files. 

     a) left click on game files      b) left click on "Delete (menu item)"

2) Delete all saved data.

     a)  left click on "Start (button)"

     b) Type "Registry Editor" (english) and open it

     c) Left click on "Computer (tree item)" in "Registry Editor"

     d) Left click on "HKEY_CURRENT_USER (tree item)" in "Registry Editor"

     e) Left click on "SOFTWARE (tree item)" in "Registry Editor"

     f) Left click on "TofallyGames (tree item)" in "Registry Editor"

     g) Left click on "TofallyGames (tree item)" in "Registry Editor"

     h) Right click on "Make You're Way To The (tree item)" in "Registry Editor"

     i) Left click on "Delete (menu item)

You should have now deleted the game files.
